Posts.EditableText:
Bah, wasn't all me. There are others too; for their help I say thanks. I believe I categorized about 5-6 pages of games... Unfortunetly most of those ended up in the Sandpit (Unfinished/Demo/Crap).

More and more games keep getting dumped in there so I suppose my (And the other Mods) job will be never done.

Thanks Jay anway.
